name: Arcade Album #1
overview: A compilation release of Spy's Demise, The Spy Strikes Back, and Thunderbombs. Spy's Demise is a vaguely Pac-Man style game, where you gather intelligence in various floors of a building while avoiding guards. The Spy Strikes Back repeats the theme of avoiding guards while maneuvering through 5 different maps. Thunderbombs is an arcade shooter with enemies on multiple sides of the screen.
